content: {"name": "Social Service Association of Ridgewood", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Only serves residents of Ridgewood, Glenwood, Ho Ho Kus, Wykoff and Midland Park", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6 Station Plaza", "address_2": null, "city": "Short Hills", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07078", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.725468, "longitude": -74.32370019999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 444-2980", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Walk-ins accepted"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers and Clothes upon availability"}]}
